briefTitle: Phase 3 Study of MAP0004 in Adult Migraineurs
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Controlled, Parallel Group, Phase 3 Study of MAP0004 in Adult Migraineurs for a Single Migraine Followed by Open Label Extension.
summary: This is a randomized, double blind, placebo controlled, parallel group study of MAP0004 in adult migraineurs. Subjects will self administer study drug in the outpatient setting.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Pain Relief at 2 Hours From Time of First Dose
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 2 hours from time of first dose
